sense.def:
To hear sounds
pomeni zavedati se zvokov, ker dosežejo naša ušesa.

seg.quote: He heard a distant voice shouting.

sense.def:
Kadar sodnik ali sodišče
hears a case
ali
hears evidence
, uradno posluša primer ali dokaze, da bi lahko razsodil o primeru.

To hear from someone
pomeni od nekoga prejeti pismo ali telefonski klic.

seg.quote: They'll be delighted to hear from you again.

sense.def:
To hear some news or information
pomeni izvedeti novico ali podatek, ker nam ga nekdo pove ali je omenjen po radiu ali televiziji.

seg.quote: My first meeting with the woman confirmed everything I had heard about her.
I was glad to hear that things are quietening down.
He came to hear of their difficulties.

sense.def:
I won't hear of someone doing something
rečemo, kadar nekomu nočemo dovoliti, da bi nekaj storil.

I have never heard of someone or something
rečemo, kadar o nekom ali nečem ničesar ne vemo.

seg.quote: Nobody had ever heard of him.
